About me

My goal is to gain knowledge in the field of front-end development.

Code

                        
                            
            function indexEqualsValue(arr) {
                let left = 0;
                let right = arr.length - 1;
                let mid;
                let result = -1;
                        
                while (left <& right) {
                    mid = Math.round(left + (right - left) / 2);
                        
                    if (arr[mid] == mid) {
                        result = mid;
                        right = mid - 1;
                    }
                    else if (mid < arr[mid]) {
                        right = mid - 1;
                    }
                    else {
                        left = mid + 1;
                    }
                }
                return result;
                }
